subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ryan Miller stopped 30 shots for his fifth shutout of the season in leading the Buffalo Sabres to a 2-0 victory over the visiting Devils that all but ended the Devils’ playoff hopes Saturday night.
snippet: Ryan Miller stopped 30 shots for his fifth shutout of the season in leading the Buffalo Sabres to a 2-0 victory over the visiting Devils that all but ended the Devils’ playoff hopes Saturday night.
